column4: people using pidgin : check out the facebook plugin its really cool
what does it do?
is it in the repos?
nope...you'll need wget hang on
wget http://pidgin-facebookchat.googlecode.com/files/pidgin-facebookchat-1.38.deb
then dpkg it
is it a plugin or a new type of account?
i just installed it
its a plugin....you'll need to have an account on facebook to access it and restart pidgin to access it
it just made pidgin crash ;)
: what ?? its working here
where do i report bugs to?
where should i submit the crash log?
lemme check
the bugs have to logged in bugs.launchpad.com exact  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/pidgin/+bug/258497
can't submit the report there, it's not a pidgin issue, it's a facebook plugin issue
did you check the page comments ?
yes i did
they say its an invalid bug...the author has fixed the problem but not comeout with the fix ye
not the same bug anyway
the bug he is referencing is from a year ago ;)

it is ..links to the one which you have an issue with...and guess what mine crashed too........i am looking for the new version.......check if you  like http://code.google.com/p/pidgin-facebookchat/issues/detail?id=139
the last comment on that bug was Aug 16, 2008
